algorithm: Prioritizes filling containers by placing items based on a space-filling heuristic, favoring orientations and positions that minimize wasted space within each layer.
Places the item that best fills the largest available space, choosing placement based on minimizing the remaining bounding box volume.

Iteratively place remaining items of each type by trying all possible trucks/orientations, prioritizing placements that minimize wasted space at the item's height level, and selecting a new truck if no placement is feasible.
Select the item with the largest volume and place it into the best truck or a new truck, trying all orientations and prioritizing the lowest z coordinate for stable packing.
Select an unplaced item, iterate through orientations to find a valid placement in an existing or new truck, prioritizing placements that minimize remaining space.
